three_star.title: Cut into my ankle bones & not enough arch support
three_star.content: I've always had Nike running shoes because year after year they fit my little skinny foot with high arches. This particular shoe does not have the usual Nike arch support, and the fabric next to my ankles is up too high and rubs against my ankle if i don't wear thick enough socks. Love the plain color with pink - just what i wanted.  Just doesn't work for MY feet.
three_star.author: Ellen S. Schwartz
three_star.product: Nike Women's Reax Run 5 Running Shoes (White/Metallic Silver/Dark Grey, Numeric_12)
